analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/30/0x83f21fc58b04af42c23b5c468ba395319c9a8f60.sol:
	Contract IEtherToken has payable functions:
	 - deposit (/unique_chucks/30/0x83f21fc58b04af42c23b5c468ba395319c9a8f60.sol#554)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
